newsitem.title: USA: WellCare to cut about 15 pct of workforce.
newsitem.headline: WellCare to cut about 15 pct of workforce.

text.p: WellCare Management Group Inc on Thursday said it would reduce its staff by 45 employees after recent commercial disenrollments at its health maintenance organizations.
The staff reductions, which represent 15 percent of the company's 310-employee workforce, were also a response to decreases in Medicaid reimbursement rates, the company said.
"However, WellCare expects to increase the number of employees in the marketing department by about five percent to support recently announced service area expansions," WellCare said in a statement.
"WellCare intends to continue to enroll and provide medical benefits to Medicaid patients, but we will likely be more selective in the counties in which we offer this service," it said.
The WellCare Management Group Inc is the parent company of WellCare of New York Inc and WellCare of Connecticut Inc.
